definition: lapis lazuli (mineral of the square albite family)
abbr. for 青海[Qing1 hai3], Qinghai Province
gold/chemical element Au/generic term for lustrous and ductile metals/money/golden/highly respected/one of the eight categories of ancient musical instruments 八音[ba1 yin1]
dry measure for grain equal to ten dou 斗/ten pecks/one hundred liters
rock/stone/stone inscription/one of the eight categories of ancient musical instruments 八音[ba1 yin1]

sentences.english: We discovered a metal ring and a piece of lapis lazuli.
sentences.chinese: 我们发现了一个金属环和一块青金石。

sentences.english: They are circling the Lapis Lazuli stone in clockwise direction.
sentences.chinese: 他们是以顺时钟的方向环绕著青金石。

sentences.english: Gold was frequently decorated with three colors of cornelian , turquoise lapis lazuli.
sentences.chinese: 黄金常常装饰三种颜色的玛瑙，绿松石青金石。

sentences.english: It is said that Lapis helps one understand the mind.
sentences.chinese: 有人说，青金石有助于了解心。

sentences.english: The paper introduces the lapis lazuli's spreading and important points in identification and collection.
sentences.chinese: 本介绍青金石在我国的流传使用及其鉴藏要点。

sentences.english: Lapis was a cure for melancholy and for certain types of fever.
sentences.chinese: 青金石是一种治疗忧郁和某些类型的发烧。

sentences.english: Lapis lazuli is a dark blue microcrystalline rock composed primarily of the mineral lazurite .
sentences.chinese: 蜜腊为深蓝色微晶石的主要组成矿物青金石。

sentences.english: The history of its provenance and application is summarized in this paper.
sentences.chinese: 概述了青金石的产地来源和使用历史。

definition: citrine (orange or yellow quartz SiO2 as a semiprecious stone)
